thread.title: What Trump Just Did on the Golf Course has the MSM Going Berserk
thread.title_full: What Trump Just Did on the Golf Course has the MSM Going Berserk

author: John S. Roberts
title: What Trump Just Did on the Golf Course has the MSM Going Berserk
text:
07:00pm February 13, 2017   
Donald Trump is entitled to vacations as president. However, the difference between his “vacations” and those taken by Barack Obama are vast. 
Obama spent nearly $100 million in eight years traveling to Hawaii and other destinations. 
Trump is merely going to his resort in Florida to conduct business. 
You see, Trump recently entertained Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe at Mar-a-Lago. 
What 45 did to the media has them enraged… 
From IJ Review : 
On Saturday, President Trump went out for a round of golf with Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe. Media bias rules dictate that when the occupant of the Oval Office is a Republican, it’s alright to complain about him golfing. 
Naturally, the press corps tagged along with the president and prime minister, but when it came time to hit the links, Trump wanted some privacy…so he banished the media to the basement: Trump's press corps has been placed in a basement suite at Jupiter golf club. Black plastic over windows to give Trump privacy as he golfs. pic.twitter.com/8zbqi5HGSD 
— Jennifer Jacobs (@JenniferJJacobs) February 11, 2017 
Reactions… @JenniferJJacobs The press corps puts the lotion on its skin or else it gets the suite again.
